title: Recent Research on Fasting and Calorie Restriction
editorial: This issue highlights how different forms of calorie restriction and fasting compare in real-world and experimental settings.

studies.title: Calorie restriction is better tolerated than time-restricted eating in older adults
studies.summary: Older adults adhered better to structured calorie restriction programs than to time-restricted eating, especially when interventions were remotely supported.

studies.title: Alternate-day fasting shows modest advantage for weight loss
studies.summary: Across randomized trials, alternate-day fasting slightly outperformed continuous calorie restriction for short-term weight loss, though differences were small.
